an10.42:1.4: Idhupali, bhikkhu adhammam dhammoti dipenti, dhammam adhammoti dipenti, avinayam vinayoti dipenti, vinayam avinayoti dipenti, abhasitam alapitam tathagatena bhasitam lapitam tathagatenati dipenti, bhasitam lapitam tathagatena abhasitam alapitam tathagatenati dipenti, anacinnam tathagatena acinnam tathagatenati dipenti, acinnam tathagatena anacinnam tathagatenati dipenti, apannattam tathagatena pannattam tathagatenati dipenti, pannattam tathagatena apannattam tathagatenati dipenti.
